```{r, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE}
library(eurlex)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(rmarkdown)

acts <- elx_make_query("any", sector = 3) |> elx_run_query()

regs <- acts |> filter(str_sub(celex,6,6) == "R")
decs <- acts |> filter(str_sub(celex,6,6) == "D")
dirs <- acts |> filter(str_sub(celex,6,6) == "L")
```

## The Legislative Output of the European Union

Up to and including `r format(Sys.time(), '%d %B, %Y')`, the European U and its predecessors have produced `r nrow(regs)` number of regulations, `r nrow(dirs)` number of directives and `r nrow(decs)` number of decisions.
